alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Multnomah; Washington (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 7:36PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Oregon and southwest Washington, including the following counties, in northwest Oregon, Clackamas, Multnomah and Washington. In southwest Washington, Clark. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM PST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 736 PM PST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hillsboro, Oregon City, Battle Ground, Washougal, Sandy, Portland Downtown, Vancouver Downtown, Portland, Vancouver, Gresham, Beaverton, Tigard, Lake Oswego, Tualatin, West Linn, Forest Grove, Milwaukie, Wilsonville, Camas and Troutdale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
